description:
A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn`t the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Legend Has Existed in Konoha
Die Legende von Konoha – Der Onbaa existiert!
Konohagakure no Densetsu Onbaa wa Jitsuzaishita!!
Onboon, le nouveau compagnon de Naruto
ตำนานแห่งหมู่บ้านโคโนฮะ
木ノ葉隠れの伝説 オンバアは実在した!!
